column17:
Undergraduate CT-resident full-time tuition rises from $9,300 in 2015-16 to $13,050 in 2025-26, while graduate CT-resident full-time tuition goes from $10,454 to $14,562 over the same span. Room & Board (standard residence hall) moves from $11,134 to $13,276. Separately, international and “Domestic/NEBHE” rates are shown for both undergraduate and graduate full-time students; part-time undergraduate, graduate, and doctoral rates are provided on a per-credit basis.

Notes on terms:

NEBHE: New England Board of Higher Education regional tuition rate (a discounted non-resident rate for eligible New England students; first shown explicitly starting 2024-25).

Per credit: Amount charged for part-time enrollment, per credit hour.

Room & Board: Standard residence hall charge (annual).
